p: Catechins (Fig. 2) are natural flavonoid polyphenolic compounds that primarily include, catechin [(+)-3,3′,4′,5,7-pentahydroxyflavan)], epicatechin (EC) [(−)-3,3′,4′,5,7-pentahydroxyflavan], epicatechin gallate (ECG) [C 22H 18O 10], epigallocatechin (EGC) [(−)-3,3′,4′,5,5′,7-hexahydroxyflavan], their stereoisomer gallocatechin (GC) [C 15H 14O 7] and epigallocatechin gallate (EGCG) [C 22H 18O 11] [ 43].
